   <main class="tm-main uk-section uk-section-default" id="tm-main" uk-height-viewport="expand: true">
    <div class="uk-container">
     <article class="uk-article post-382 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-382" typeof="Article" vocab="https://schema.org/">
      <meta content="FAQ" property="name"/>
      <meta content="Lenka Volenikova" property="author" typeof="Person"/>
      <meta content="2024-11-21T10:15:47+00:00" property="dateModified"/>
      <meta class="uk-margin-remove-adjacent" content="2019-10-19T09:16:11+00:00" property="datePublished"/>
      <h1 class="uk-article-title">
       FAQ
      </h1>
      <div class="uk-margin-medium" property="text">
       <p>
        <span style="font-size: 14pt;">
         <strong>
          Deadlines & Important Dates
         </strong>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           What are the application deadlines for the 2025-27 intake of the GLODEP program?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The call for the 2025–2027 intake applications is open from November 2024 until the 31
        </span>
        <sup>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          st
         </span>
        </sup>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         of January 2025 (23:59 CET) for the
        </span>
        <b>
         <i>
          potential unguaranteed EMJM scholarship
         </i>
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         applicants and by 30
        </span>
        <sup>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          th
         </span>
        </sup>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         April 2025 (23:59 CET) for self-paid applicants. The administration fee is
         <b>
          790 CZK
         </b>
         (approx. 31 €).
        </span>
        <b>
         The administration fee is compulsory for all applicants
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         . No exceptions are possible.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           When will admission results be communicated?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         For more information on the admission timeframe, please check the
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Admission Calendar
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         .
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           When does the GLODEP program start?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The Program generally starts in the first half of September.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           When should I arrive in Olomouc? What happens if I miss the beginning of the GLODEP program?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         There is an obligatory Orientation Week one week before the first semester starts. You will find all the important dates in the academic calendar and in the information package. We strongly advise you to make all the arrangements to arrive in Olomouc at least a few days before the start of the Program (i.e. before the start of Orientation Week).
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-size: 14pt;">
         <strong>
          Admission Requirements
         </strong>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Do I have to pay the administration fee in case I am applying for the
          </span>
         </i>
         <b>
          <i>
           potential unguaranteed EMJM
          </i>
         </b>
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           scholarship? Is there any exception?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The administration fee is
         <b>
          790 CZK
         </b>
         (approx. 31 €). The administration fee is compulsory for all applicants. No exceptions are possible. Please do not contact us regarding this.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           How to pay for the application? Do I need to have a Czech bank account? Do I have to pay in CZK?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The smoothest way to pay the administration fee is by paying with a debit/credit card – you do not need to have an account in CZK – just follow the instructions in the “payment gate.”
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Do I have to submit hard copies of the documents?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The documents related to the GLODEP application are submitted electronically with your
        </span>
        <a href="https://prihlaska.upol.cz/prihlaska/info.xhtml?lang=en">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          e-application
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         .
        </span>
        <b>
         No hard copies are required
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         .  Please note that after clicking on the submit button, it will no longer be possible to change the uploaded documents.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Which academic backgrounds are eligible?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         You are eligible to apply if you have completed at least a bachelor’s degree. At the same time, you have to certify your bachelor’s degree before enrolment to the program (beginning of September). While the program is open to applicants from diverse disciplinary backgrounds, knowledge, and experience, a suitable applicant typically has excellent academic results in a relevant degree (e.g. development studies, economics, geography, international relations, and sociology); strong interest in international development with aspirations to work in the area related to development policy; very good command of English.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Can I apply for GLODEP if I have not finished my bachelor’s degree yet?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Yes, you can apply for GLODEP if you have not finished your bachelor’s degree yet. Applicants without completed tertiary education must provide a
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Declaration of Honour
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         stating when they expect to receive it (if they are admitted to the program, they must provide the diploma and its recognition for enrolment in early September 2025).
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Which English language certificates are acceptable?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Please see the
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Criteria and Requirements
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         – section Proof of English proficiency. Your language certificate must be attached to the application by the deadline of the call. Students who do not have a language certificate are ineligible for the program.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           How can I apply for GLODEP?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         You apply for admission via the
        </span>
        <a href="https://prihlaska.upol.cz/prihlaska/info.xhtml?lang=en">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          online application portal
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         at Palacký University. Please follow the instructions in the section
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Applicatio
         </span>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          n
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         carefully and attach all required documents.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           I would like to add one attachment to the application after submitting it. Is this possible?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Unfortunately, we cannot consider any documents received after the scholarship application deadline. The
         <a href="https://prihlaska.upol.cz/prihlaska/info.xhtml?lang=en">
          application
         </a>
         must be submitted and paid before the deadline – 31
        </span>
        <sup>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          st
         </span>
        </sup>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         January 2025; otherwise, it is assessed as invalid/ineligible. The payment must be sent before 31
        </span>
        <sup>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          st
         </span>
        </sup>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         January 2025.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           I would like to change any attachments in the application after submitting it – is it possible?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         It is impossible to change anything (any attachments) in the
         <a href="https://prihlaska.upol.cz/prihlaska/info.xhtml?lang=en">
          application
         </a>
         after submitting or after the deadline.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <b>
         Please do not send us emails with attached documents since they will not be considered. Attach all relevant documents to your online application only.
        </b>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         If you have a precise question concerning the application form or a technical problem, contact
        </span>
        <a href="mailto:helpdesk@upol.cz">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          helpdesk@upol.cz
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         .
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         If you have a specific question about the GLODEP program (and you did not find the answer on the website), contact
        </span>
        <a href="mailto:study@glodep.eu">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          study@glodep.eu
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         .
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           What does the Declaration of Honour mean? What should be stated in this document
          </span>
         </i>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          ?
         </span>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         In some exceptional cases (stated in the
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Criteria and Requirements
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         ), you can use the template for the document “Declaration of Honour” (template in section
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Criteria and Requirements
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         ) – you are declaring in this document (under your Honour) that – for example, –  you are an English native speaker and/or ii) explaining the reasons, why you can’t have your passport valid minimum until September 2027, etc.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The document “Declaration of Honour” should contain your full name, date of birth, statement you want to declare, and signature. See the template in the
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Criteria and Requirements
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         section.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-size: 14pt;">
         <strong>
          Selection and Registration
         </strong>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Where/when can I find the admission results?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Please follow our
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Admission Calendar
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         .
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The best-ranked applicants (admitted to the program) will be invited (via email mentioned in the application) for the online interview to compete for the
        </span>
        <b>
         <i>
          potential unguaranteed EMJM
         </i>
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         scholarship in the second half of March/April 2025.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         All applicants’ admission results (admitted to the program or non-admitted to the program) will be published in the
        </span>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Online Application Form
        </span>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         (PORTAL – Palacký University Olomouc) in the first half of April 2025.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Those who are admitted to the program without a
        </span>
        <b>
         <i>
          potential unguaranteed EMJM scholarship
         </i>
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         – please let us know about your participation in the program (on students@glodep.eu) by the end of May 2025.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <a href="https://prihlaska.upol.cz/prihlaska/info.xhtml?lang=en">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Online Application Form
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         – Login
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         If you do not remember the user name and the password to the Online Application Form, please contact the
        </span>
        <a href="https://helpdesk.upol.cz/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          helpdesk
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         even for technical inquiries concerning the online application (
        </span>
        <i>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Anonymous request, category: E-application – technical questions or payments, change of data, etc.
         </span>
        </i>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         ).
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           How are applications evaluated?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         All eligible applications are evaluated by the Admission Committee (for criteria, see
        </span>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Criteria and Requirements
         </span>
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          )
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         . The best-ranked applicants are admitted to the program.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           I was selected for GLODEP. What happens next?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Congratulations! You will receive instructions for the next steps
        </span>
        <b>
         in the email stated in your application. Please check it regularly, even in the spam folder
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         . You should immediately begin the visa application and diploma certification procedures, as these processes may take quite a long time.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           How many students are you admitted to the program?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Every year, we receive approximately 750 applications. On average, we accept 25 students in each intake.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-size: 14pt;">
         <strong>
          Fees & Scholarships
         </strong>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Are scholarships available?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The Consortium applies for support from EACEA in 2025. Therefore the scholarship is only
        </span>
        <b>
         potential and unguaranteed
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         as the Consortium will receive the results only
        </span>
        <b>
         in summer 2025
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         . The selected candidates will be promptly informed. Now, at the application stage, the
        </span>
        <b>
         Consortium cannot guarantee this scholarship.
        </b>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           What is the tuition fee for the academic year?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The tuition fee for the academic year is 4,200 EUR, which needs to be paid by the end of September 2025 via bank transfer only.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-size: 14pt;">
         <strong>
          Visa and Housing
         </strong>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           In case I do need a visa, how do I apply for it?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         National embassies handle visa applications. You can apply for a long-term residence permit/ long-term visa (preferred – shorter procedure) at the Czech Republic embassy according to your nationality. For more information, consult the website of the
        </span>
        <a href="http://www.mzv.cz/jnp/en/information_for_aliens/long_stay_visa/study_long_term.html">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         .
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           How long does the visa procedure take?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The duration of the visa procedure depends on your home country and on the agreement that exists between your country and the Czech Republic. In our experience, three to four months are quite common. Therefore, you should start the process as soon as possible. Please check the information on the webpage at the Czech Embassy.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           Are the GLODEP Consortium universities helping me with an accommodation arrangement?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         You will be helped to arrange the accommodation at each university. During the internship/research period in the 4
        </span>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         th
        </span>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         semester, our partners can provide you with advice regarding your accommodation, but in most cases, you will have to arrange your own.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="color: #ff6600;">
         <i>
          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
           What are the costs of living in university cities?
          </span>
         </i>
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         Living costs vary between the various university cities. You can check the
        </span>
        <a href="https://www.numbeo.com/cost-of-living/">
         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
          Numbeo
         </span>
        </a>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         website to calculate the living costs city by city.
        </span>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <div class="updated">
        Updated: 21/11/2024
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
    </div>
   </main>

       <div class="uk-width-1-1">
        <h1>
         Alumni
        </h1>
        <div class="uk-panel uk-margin">
         <p>
          <span>
           Our joint Master program, Global Development Policy (GLODEP), has more than
           <strong>
            120 alumni worldwide
           </strong>
           working in various job positions (research, program officer at the international organization as well as in local NGOs, government ministries). The most significant GLODEP learning was, for most of them, the ability to analyze current development challenges and propose development policies as well as the flexibility, the ability to work in changing environments and administrative systems, and the skills to build a consensus and cooperate with people from different geographical and disciplinary backgrounds.
          </span>
         </p>
         <p>
          <strong>
           More about our alumni, follow our
           <span>
           </span>
           <a class="customize-unpreviewable" href="https://www.linkedin.com/school/glodep/?viewAsMember=true">
            LinkedIn
           </a>
          </strong>
         </p>
         <p>
          <strong>
           Follow us on our
           <span>
           </span>
           <a class="customize-unpreviewable" href="https://www.youtube.com/@GLODEP_master">
            YOUTUBE Channel
           </a>
          </strong>
         </p>
        </div>
        <hr/>
        <div class="uk-panel uk-margin">
         <h4>
          <strong>
           ALUMNI – REAL STORIES
          </strong>
         </h4>
        </div>
        <div class="uk-margin">
         <div class="uk-grid uk-child-width-1-1 uk-child-width-1-3@m uk-grid-match" uk-grid="">
          <div>
           <div class="el-item uk-card uk-card-default uk-margin-remove-first-child">
            <div class="uk-card-media-top">
             <picture>
              <source sizes="(min-width: 400px) 400px" srcset="/2024/wp-content/themes/yootheme/cache/05/Akos-Gosztonyi_final-e1736426202885-05144560.webp 400w, /2024/wp-content/themes/yootheme/cache/e1/Akos-Gosztonyi_final-e1736426202885-e13d3cbd.webp 768w, /2024/wp-content/themes/yootheme/cache/33/Akos-Gosztonyi_final-e1736426202885-3318ad47.webp 800w" type="image/webp"/>
              <img alt="" class="el-image" decoding="async" height="400" loading="lazy" src="/2024/wp-content/themes/yootheme/cache/68/Akos-Gosztonyi_final-e1736426202885-688d6b78.jpeg" width="400"/>
             </picture>
            </div>
            <div class="uk-card-body uk-margin-remove-first-child">
             <h3 class="el-title uk-card-title uk-margin-top uk-margin-remove-bottom">
              Akos Gosztonyi
              <br/>
              (Hungary – GLODEP cohort 2017-2019)
             </h3>
             <div class="el-content uk-panel uk-margin-top">
              I’m currently working as a Doctoral Researcher at the Sustainable Urban Systems and the Urban Environmental Policy research groups at the University of Helsinki. Before my current position and foll…
             </div>
             <div class="uk-margin-top">
              <a class="el-link uk-button uk-button-default" href="https://glodep.eu/akos-gosztonyi-hungary-glodep-cohort-2017-2019/">
               Read the story
              </a>
             </div>

.footer .uk-container {
	max-width: 1300px;
}


.footer p {
	color:white !important;
}
.footer a {
	text-decoration: underline;
}
.wpcf7-form {
	text-align: left;
	padding: 20px 0;
}


.wpcf7-text, .wpcf7-textarea, .wpcf7-submit {
	padding: 15px;
	border: 1px solid #E8E8E8;
	width: 90%;
}

.wpcf7-submit {
	background-color: #f7f7f7;
	border: 2px solid #e75d1f;
	color: #e75d1f;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	padding: 15px;
	transition: 0.2s ease;
	width: 40%;
	float: center;
	
}

.wpcf7-submit:hover {
	background-color: #e75d1f;
	color: #fff;
	transition: 0.2s ease;
	cursor: pointer;
}

   <main class="tm-main uk-section uk-section-default" id="tm-main" uk-height-viewport="expand: true">
    <div class="uk-container">
     <article class="uk-article post-1458 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news" id="post-1458" typeof="Article" vocab="https://schema.org/">
      <meta content="UNGUARANTEED POTENTIAL scholarship" property="name"/>
      <meta content="Lenka Volenikova" property="author" typeof="Person"/>
      <meta content="2024-10-31T10:00:23+00:00" property="dateModified"/>
      <meta class="uk-margin-remove-adjacent" content="2024-10-31T10:00:23+00:00" property="datePublished"/>
      <h1 class="uk-margin-top uk-margin-remove-bottom uk-text-center uk-article-title" property="headline">
       UNGUARANTEED POTENTIAL scholarship
      </h1>
      <p class="uk-margin-top uk-margin-remove-bottom uk-article-meta uk-text-center">
       Written on
       <time datetime="2024-10-31T10:00:23+00:00">
        31. 10. 2024
       </time>
       .                Posted in
       <a href="https://glodep.eu/category/news/" rel="category tag">
        News
       </a>
       .
      </p>
      <div class="uk-margin-medium-top" property="text">
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         The Consortium applies for support from EACEA in 2025. Therefore, the scholarship is only
        </span>
        <b>
         potential and unguaranteed
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         as the Consortium will receive the results only
        </span>
        <b>
         in summer 2025
        </b>
        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
         . The selected candidates will be promptly informed. Now, at the application stage, the Consortium
        </span>
        <b>
         cannot guarantee this scholarship.
        </b>
       </p>
      </div>
      <ul class="uk-pagination uk-margin-medium">
       <li>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/glodep-at-forum2000-conference/" rel="prev">
         <span uk-pagination-previous="">
         </span>
         Previous
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="uk-margin-auto-left">
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/call-for-application/" rel="next">
         Next
         <span uk-pagination-next="">
         </span>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </article>
    </div>
   </main>

      </h1>
      <p class="uk-margin-top uk-margin-remove-bottom uk-article-meta uk-text-center">
       Written on
       <time datetime="2025-02-14T10:04:39+00:00">
        14. 2. 2025
       </time>

   <main class="tm-main uk-section uk-section-default" id="tm-main" uk-height-viewport="expand: true">
    <div class="uk-container">
     <article class="uk-article post-1541 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news" id="post-1541" typeof="Article" vocab="https://schema.org/">
      <meta content="NEW CALL FOR APPLICATIONS IS OPEN" property="name"/>
      <meta content="Lenka Volenikova" property="author" typeof="Person"/>
      <meta content="2024-11-19T08:12:14+00:00" property="dateModified"/>
      <meta class="uk-margin-remove-adjacent" content="2024-11-07T07:34:52+00:00" property="datePublished"/>
      <h1 class="uk-margin-top uk-margin-remove-bottom uk-text-center uk-article-title" property="headline">
       NEW CALL FOR APPLICATIONS IS OPEN
      </h1>
      <p class="uk-margin-top uk-margin-remove-bottom uk-article-meta uk-text-center">
       Written on
       <time datetime="2024-11-07T07:34:52+00:00">
        7. 11. 2024
       </time>
       .                Posted in
       <a href="https://glodep.eu/category/news/" rel="category tag">
        News
       </a>
       .
      </p>
      <div class="uk-margin-medium-top" property="text">
       <p>
        The call for the 2025-2027 intake applications is open by 31st January 2025 for the potential unguaranteed EMJM scholarship applicants and by 30th April 2025 for self-paid applicants.
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/admission/criteria-and-requirements/">
         More info.
        </a>
       </p>
       <p>
        The Consortium applies for support from EACEA in 2025. Therefore, the scholarship is only
        <b>
         potential and unguaranteed
        </b>
        as the Consortium will receive the results only
        <b>
         in summer 2025
        </b>
        . The selected candidates will be promptly informed. Now, at the application stage, the Consortium
        <b>
         cannot guarantee this scholarship.
        </b>
       </p>
      </div>
      <ul class="uk-pagination uk-margin-medium">
       <li>
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/call-for-application/" rel="prev">
         <span uk-pagination-previous="">
         </span>
         Previous
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="uk-margin-auto-left">
        <a href="https://glodep.eu/akos-gosztonyi-hungary-glodep-cohort-2017-2019/" rel="next">
         Next
         <span uk-pagination-next="">
         </span>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </article>
    </div>
   </main>
